column2: How likely are you to recommend our events to a friend or colleague?

column7: What did you like most about the event?
The keynote speaker was incredibly inspiring and the networking opportunities were fantastic. I made some great connections.
column8: The workshop rooms were a bit crowded. It would be great to have more space next time.
column9: Overall a great event, looking forward to the next one!

column7: The content of Workshop A was very relevant to my work. The speaker was engaging and knowledgeable.
column8: The lunch options were a bit limited for vegetarians. Would appreciate more variety in the future.

column7: I enjoyed the networking session and meeting new people in the industry.
column8: The keynote felt a bit too generic and didn't provide many actionable takeaways for me.
column9: It was an okay event, but I was hoping for more in-depth content.

column7: The hands-on activities in Workshop B were excellent. It was great to apply what we were learning in real-time.
column8: The registration process was a bit slow in the morning, maybe more staff could help next year.
column9: Loved the interactive elements, please include more of these!

column8: The sessions I attended weren't very relevant to my field. The descriptions could have been more detailed to help me choose.
column9: The audio in the main hall for the keynote was not very clear at times.

column7: I appreciated the variety of topics covered in the workshops.
column8: The breaks between sessions felt a bit rushed. A little more time for networking would be beneficial.
column9: Good event, I learned a few new things.

column7: The entire event was very well-organized. The staff were friendly and helpful.
column8: I can't think of anything significant. Everything ran smoothly for me.
column9: Fantastic event! One of the best I've attended this year.

column7: The speaker for Workshop A was good.
column8: The room for Workshop A was too cold. It was a bit distracting.

column7: The practical examples in Workshop B were very useful.
column8: It would be helpful to have the presentation slides available for download after the event.
column9: I would recommend this event to my colleagues.

column8: The keynote was not what I expected and I left early. The event description was misleading.
column9: Very disappointed with the content. I will not be attending future events.
